headline: L3Harris Technologies (NYSE:LHX) Secures EUR 1 Billion Deal With Dutch Ministry Of Defence
summary: L3Harris Technologies (NYSE:LHX) experienced a significant price movement last week with a 11% increase, correlating with a substantial contract with the Dutch Ministry of Defence and the launch of its advanced rocket motor, eSR-19. The agreement, valued up to EUR 1 billion, focuses on delivering state-of-the-art communication technology, while the missile innovation demonstrates L3Harris's ongoing commitment to defense sector advancements. This upward trend aligns with a broader market...
